item.title: How Has the Gender Earnings Gap in Ireland Changed in Thirty Years?
item.description: This paper provides a descriptive analysis of the growth of male and female wages, weekly earnings, and differences in working patterns across the wage and earnings distribution in Ireland over the last three decades.
